QuestData.Title: Chasing Madness
QuestData.Description:
<This wretched shamble of a venthyr mumbles uncontrollably as it claws at the ground.
It looks up suddenly and points its finger at you.>
An adversary with no ferry cannot be merry unless it is wary!
<It seems to be waiting for a response from you.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Discover what Lost Sybille wants to show you.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Theotar in the Desiccation.
QuestData.RewardText:
Well, aren't you an unexpected windfall?
I'm afraid I've no tea to offer you at the present. Forgive my poor manners.
